function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Limited data collection due to covid-19 restrictions","Panic buying leading to stockouts and scarcity of essential goods","Miscommunication of professionalism and seriousness due to font choice","Inconsistent compliance with government regulations due to lack of resources for smaller retailers","Use of paper signage in retail stores may deteriorate quickly due to weather conditions","Lack of replacement signs for covid-19 measures communication","Inaccurate and unreliable ai forecasting models due to noisy and limited data","Exclusion of nonpeer-reviewed articles and studies in other languages with no English translation might lead to language and publication bias","Inadequate real-time case surveillance","Transmission of contagious diseases through community wastewater","Cybersecurity, privacy, and ethics concerns related to digital contact tracing apps for covid-19","Digital twin systems for water and wastewater management may pose a cybersecurity risk, leading to potential sabotage or disruption of critical infrastructure","Lack of early detection of emerging pollutants in the water supply can pose a health risk to consumers and the environment"]}
